alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 11 at 12:41PM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 2 PM MST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero. * WHERE...Northern Campbell County, Southern Campbell County, Western Crook County and Northeastern Crook County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 4 AM to 2 PM MST Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 2 PM Friday to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A wind chill advisory means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands. A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Even if you are outdoors for just a few minutes, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook
